# Security Policy

## Supported Versions



| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| v2.<latest>   | :white_check_mark:                |
| v1.x   | :x: |


## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please [open an issue](https://github.com/phpmetrics/PhpMetrics/issues) with the details to reproduce the exploit.

Thanks for your help !
